meanings.definition: A thin, usually pounded piece of meat or fish
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared delicious paillards for the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the chicken paillards at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The paillards on my plate looked like tasty little blankets.
meanings.sent4: The paillards sizzled on the grill, filling the air with a tempting aroma.
meanings.sent5: The tender paillards melted in my mouth with each bite.

meanings.definition: A thin slice of meat or fish, usually grilled or sautéed
meanings.sent1: Mom cooked flavorful paillards for our family dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served juicy beef paillards with a side of vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to steal a piece of paillards from the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: The paillards glistened with a golden brown color from the grill.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling paillards made my stomach growl in anticipation.
